summary: 4 years of experience in QA testing for Android devices and web applications, with a strong focus on Android certification, compliance, security, camera, multimedia and system-level validation.

responsibilities: Lead a high-impact project covering GMS certification, RSA compliance, Product Development Testing (PDT), OS upgrades, and CVE management for over 40 devices launched across Android versions 12 to 15.
Oversee GMS certification for 40+ Android devices on Qualcomm and MediaTek platforms, ensuring CDD compliance.
Supervise 13 engineers, assigning tasks, managing resources, and tracking project progress.
Ensure timely completion of milestones while optimizing team performance.
Manage key security features Verified Boot, SELinux, Play Integrity API.
Handle RSA configuration and validation per market-specific agreements.
Coordinate Variant Build Approval (VBA) for chipset variants.
Collaborate with Google's teams (APA, AFEE, GMS) to stay aligned on updates.
Lead Post-Deployment Testing (PDT) during OS upgrades.
Streamline update processes, reduce downtime, accelerate rollouts.
Monitor CVEs, validate fixes, and ensure performance impact is minimal.
Develop custom validation tools for early issue detection.
Troubleshoot with logcat, dmesg, ADB, and other system logs.
Collaborate across regions (India, EEA, Taiwan, Russia) for compliance.
Manage fingerprint certification for chipset variants.
Provide stakeholders with dashboards and detailed reports.

education.institution: Siddhartha Institute of Science and Technology

technical: Google Tools: APA, AOSP, AFAP, CI.android.com, CS.android.com, Partner ticket, BTS, Google-drive, Google Chat
Qualcomm Tools: QXDM, QPST, PDC, Crash scope, RMS, Axiom, PCAT, J-Tag, Qfil, Orbit, Quts, Apex
Integration Tools: Electric Commander, Tiberium, Putty
Testing Tools: ALM, Oplus dev, Gtest, Noah, JIRA, Jenkins (Basics), Docker (Basics), API Testing (Basics), Manual testing, Logcat, Bug report
soft_skills: Exceptional ability to learn fast and master new concepts
Effective communicator skilled in using Google Workspace tools for documentation, collaboration, and reporting

projects.name: Google Mobile Services (GMS) Certification, RSA Compliance, PDT, OS Upgrade & CVE Management
projects.description: In my current role, I lead a high-impact project covering GMS certification, RSA compliance, Product Development Testing (PDT), OS upgrades, and CVE management for over 40 devices launched across Android versions 12 to 15.
